title: Lost Love Letter Resurfaces After 70 Years
teaser: From WWII Europe, Bill Moore wrote a love letter to Bernadean. When it was found at a thrift shop, Denver's KMGH-TV helped return the letter. Moore said of his late wife Bernadean, "I loved her."
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
